name: apparatus-editor
description: Apparatus is a hybrid graphics editor / programming environment for creating interactive diagrams.

scripts.build-js: browserify -x react -x underscore src/index.coffee -o dist/apparatus.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee"
scripts.watch-js: watchify -x react -x underscore src/index.coffee -o dist/apparatus.js -t coffeeify --extension=".coffee" -dv
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.watch: npm run watch-js & npm run watch-css
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run livereload
